directions: Bring the water, olive oil, and salt to a boil in a saucepan. Pour in the couscous, cover, and immediately remove from heat. Let sit covered 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork. Stir in the, artichoke hearts, tomato, parsley, feta cheese, and lemon juice. Season with black pepper.
ingredients: 1 (13.75 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained, finely chopped
1 large tomato, cut into small dice
title: Mediterranean Couscous
